properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 4th October 2024** A friendly, welcoming community centre offering a variety of different groups, clubs and activities. We have a reuse shop, a community fridge, a weekly pop-up cafe, a community kitchen, rooms for hire, emergency food provision, festivals and markets. We also have vital services such as Citizen's Advice, Skills Development and Hearing Aid Clinics.
